verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord this heart must sing
Of all that You have done for me
The beauty of the cross
The greatness of Your loss
So I'll thank You for the day
When You washed my sin away

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Help me understand
Just what it meant for You, Jesus
The holy King of all
Upon a sinner's cross
So I'll thank You for the day
When You washed my sin away

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I will never lose the wonder
Of the blood You shed for me
There could be no greater love than this
Through all eternity
So I'll thank You for the day
When You washed my sin away
